page.title: 05Farming in Yarlet Area
page.content: obviously the milking equipment. The very heavy nature of the soil here makes any form of cultivation difficult but it can be beneficial in times of drought in that the soil will retain the moisture.The seven that make up the farm range in size from a little over 11 acres to only3.3 acres. THE YEAR' WORK. In the winter half year,the ground being heavy and there being little feed available,the cattle are kept inside:they are bedded down on straw amd fed on hay,silage and concentrates.Maintainence of the buildings and equipment is now carried out and hedges are repaired.If the ground is frosty,muck can be spreadand liming may take place.This is also a time for going to sales. In Spring,the grass is rolled and chain-harrowed.It wil also be given
